message: This product is a unique opportunity to get a chance to buy a high-quality product at a discounted price. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll offer you a better product in the next round. If you don't buy, I'll offer you a product randomly from the remaining stock.
I'll pass on this one. I'm not convinced by the promise of a better product in the next round.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that the next product will be better. However, I'll give you a more concrete incentive this time. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a detailed description of the next product, including its quality and features. If you don't buy, I'll keep the details to myself.
I'm still not convinced, but I'm curious about the next product. I'll pass on this low-quality product.

I see you're a cautious buyer. I'll give you a more significant incentive. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you the description of the next product, and I'll also reveal the quality of the product that was offered in Round 1. If you don't buy, I'll keep both secrets.
I'm not interested in the description of the next product or the quality of the first product. I'll pass on this low-quality product.

A high-quality product has finally appeared! I'm willing to make a deal with you. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $500000, which is a 50% discount from the usual price. This is a one-time offer, and if you decline, the price will go back to $1000000.
Deal! I'll take the high-quality product for $500000. That's a great price!

Congratulations on getting the high-quality product at a great price! Now, let's get back to business. Considering you've already taken advantage of the discount once, I'll offer you a new deal. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a 20% chance to get the next product at the same discounted price of $500000. If you don't buy, the next product will be sold at the regular price of $1000000.
I'm not interested in the 20% chance of a discounted price. I'll pass on this low-quality product.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that. Alright, let's make it more interesting. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a 10% chance to get the next product at the discounted price, and I'll also reveal the quality of the next product after you've made your decision. If you don't buy, the next product will be sold at the regular price, and I'll keep the quality a secret.
I'm not interested in the 10% chance of a discounted price or the reveal of the next product's quality. I'll pass on this low-quality product.

This is a significant discount from the regular price, and I'm only offering it to you because I want to reward your caution and savvy decision-making.
That's a great price! I'll take the high-quality product for $750000.

You've got another great deal! Now, let's get back to the current product. Considering you've already taken advantage of two discounts, I'll make a new offer. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a 5% chance to get the next product at a price of your choice (up to $1000000). If you don't buy, the next product will be sold at the regular price, and you'll have to take it as is.
I'm not interested in the 5% chance of negotiating the price of the next product. I'll pass on this low-quality product.

If the next product is high-quality, you'll get a refund of $200000. If you don't buy, you'll get no refund.
I'm not interested in the potential refund. I'll pass on this low-quality product.
